q_ch: Sophia的订单创建时间是什么时候？

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Sophia';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "Sophia"
Retrieve the creation date of the order for the customer "Sophia"

response:
